definition: To publicly communicate or make known a specific occurrence, event, or information, often through official channels or media outlets. It is commonly employed to report or disclose incidents, crimes, or violations to the authorities or relevant parties.

examples.german: Die Polizei hat den Unfall angezeigt.
Sie hat ihren Verlust bei der Versicherung angezeigt.
examples.english: She reported her loss to the insurance company.

examples.german: Der Computer zeigt einen Fehler an.
